Package turtlekit.simulations.tests

Class Summary
Creation testing turle creation
CreationObserver This agent watch the number of turtles in the cration simulation.
Creator Turtles who create other kind of turtle during simulation and die after a countdown
Mosquito a turtle for a turtle command test
Mosquitoes only a test simulation
Ovni a turtle for a graphic test
OvniLauncher only a test simulation
SpecialViewer A viewer that override the paintTurtle method to obtain a different visual effect,
Walker the only thing is to walk and change color
Walkers Launcher for a small test simulation
